name: Redwave
description:
The land is crumbling, extreme heat caused by an unknown being, wreak havoc to the planet inhabitant. Venture into the desert and solve the mystery to stop the Redwave now or never.

A game specially made for:
★ JUNE/JULY JACKPOT JAM ★

How to play:
Move with A&D, interact with LMB.

If you already try the game, what do you think about the game prototype?
Any feedbacks always wanted.
Have fun!
